mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ADBOARD ( ADBOARDNUM, MEMNUM, ADBOARDTITLE, ADBOARDCOMENT, ADBOARDIMAGE, INSERTDATE, UPDATEDATE, DELETEYN, ADBOARDHITS ) VALUES ( adboard_seq.NEXTVAL, #{memnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adboardtitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adboardcoment, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adboardimage, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 'Y', #{adboardhits, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.ADBOARDNUM ADBOARDNUM ,A.ADBOARDTITLE ADBOARDTITLE ,A.DELETEYN DELETEYN ,TO_CHAR(A.INSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') INSERTDATE ,A.ADBOARDHITS ADBOARDHITS FROM ADBOARD A WHERE A.DELETEYN = 'Y' ORDER BY 1 DESC
)
